BILLING_EVENTS.description: Contains billing event information for users

columns.name: EVENT_ID
columns.business_description: Unique identifier for each billing event

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.business_description: Foreign key reference to user account

columns.name: EVENT_TYPE
columns.business_description: Type of billing event (subscription, payment, refund, etc.)

columns.name: AMOUNT
columns.business_description: Monetary amount associated with the billing event

columns.name: EVENT_DATE
columns.business_description: Date when the billing event occurred

columns.name: LOAD_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when record was first loaded into the system

columns.name: UPDATE_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when record was last updated

columns.name: SOURCE_SYSTEM
columns.business_description: Source system from which the data originated

FEATURE_USAGE.description: Tracks usage of various Zoom features during meetings

columns.name: USAGE_ID
columns.business_description: Unique identifier for each feature usage record

columns.name: MEETING_ID
columns.business_description: Foreign key reference to meeting

columns.name: FEATURE_NAME
columns.business_description: Name of the Zoom feature being tracked
columns.domain_values: screen_share, recording, breakout_rooms, chat, whiteboard, polls

columns.name: USAGE_COUNT
columns.business_description: Number of times the feature was used in the meeting

columns.name: USAGE_DATE
columns.business_description: Date when the feature usage occurred

columns.name: LOAD_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when record was first loaded into the system

columns.name: UPDATE_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when record was last updated

columns.name: SOURCE_SYSTEM
columns.business_description: Source system from which the data originated

LICENSES.description: Contains license information assigned to users

columns.name: LICENSE_ID
columns.business_description: Unique identifier for each license

columns.name: LICENSE_TYPE
columns.business_description: Type of Zoom license
columns.domain_values: Basic, Pro, Business, Enterprise, Enterprise Plus

columns.name: ASSIGNED_TO_USER_ID
columns.business_description: Foreign key reference to user who has the license

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.business_description: Date when the license becomes active

columns.name: END_DATE
columns.business_description: Date when the license expires

columns.name: LOAD_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when record was first loaded into the system

columns.name: UPDATE_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when record was last updated

columns.name: SOURCE_SYSTEM
columns.business_description: Source system from which the data originated

columns.name: MEETING_ID
columns.business_description: Unique identifier for each meeting

columns.name: HOST_ID
columns.business_description: Foreign key reference to user who hosted the meeting

columns.name: MEETING_TOPIC
columns.business_description: Subject or topic of the meeting

columns.name: START_TIME
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the meeting started

columns.name: END_TIME
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the meeting ended

columns.name: DURATION_MINUTES
columns.business_description: Duration of the meeting in minutes

columns.name: LOAD_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when record was first loaded into the system

columns.name: UPDATE_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when record was last updated

columns.name: SOURCE_SYSTEM
columns.business_description: Source system from which the data originated

columns.name: PARTICIPANT_ID
columns.business_description: Unique identifier for each participant session

columns.name: MEETING_ID
columns.business_description: Foreign key reference to meeting

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.business_description: Foreign key reference to user who participated

columns.name: JOIN_TIME
columns.business_description: Timestamp when participant joined the meeting

columns.name: LEAVE_TIME
columns.business_description: Timestamp when participant left the meeting

columns.name: LOAD_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when record was first loaded into the system

columns.name: UPDATE_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when record was last updated

columns.name: SOURCE_SYSTEM
columns.business_description: Source system from which the data originated

columns.name: TICKET_ID
columns.business_description: Unique identifier for each support ticket

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.business_description: Foreign key reference to user who created the ticket

columns.name: TICKET_TYPE
columns.business_description: Category or type of support ticket

columns.name: RESOLUTION_STATUS
columns.business_description: Current status of the support ticket

columns.name: OPEN_DATE
columns.business_description: Date when the support ticket was created

columns.name: LOAD_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when record was first loaded into the system

columns.name: UPDATE_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when record was last updated

columns.name: SOURCE_SYSTEM
columns.business_description: Source system from which the data originated

USERS.description: Contains user account information and profile data

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.business_description: Unique identifier for each user account

columns.name: USER_NAME
columns.business_description: Display name of the user

columns.name: EMAIL
columns.business_description: Email address of the user

columns.name: COMPANY
columns.business_description: Company or organization the user belongs to

columns.name: PLAN_TYPE
columns.business_description: Type of Zoom plan the user is subscribed to
columns.domain_values: Basic, Pro, Business, Enterprise, Enterprise Plus

columns.name: LOAD_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when record was first loaded into the system

columns.name: UPDATE_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when record was last updated

columns.name: SOURCE_SYSTEM
columns.business_description: Source system from which the data originated
